analysis.description:
LRCLongTermHoldingContract.start (/unique_chucks/5/0x239de3a0d6ca5f21601f83327ea2174225eb7156.sol#196-207) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(depositStartTime == 0)

Reentrancy in LRCLongTermHoldingContract.withdrawLRC (/unique_chucks/5/0x239de3a0d6ca5f21601f83327ea2174225eb7156.sol#266-297):
	External calls:
	- lrcBonus = getBonus(lrcWithdrawalBase) (/unique_chucks/5/0x239de3a0d6ca5f21601f83327ea2174225eb7156.sol#279-280)
	- balance = lrcBalance() (/unique_chucks/5/0x239de3a0d6ca5f21601f83327ea2174225eb7156.sol#280-282)

	- records (/unique_chucks/5/0x239de3a0d6ca5f21601f83327ea2174225eb7156.sol#293)
